text:
hi#nOqmIndrA#-viShNUq apa#saspAqrE aqsya | 
juqShEthA$M ~Myaqj~jaM dravi#NaM ca dhattaqmari#ShTairnaH paqthiBi#H pAqraya#ntA || 
uqBA ji#gyathuqrna parA# jayEthEq na parA# jigyE kataqraScaqnainO$H | 
indra#Sca viShNOq yadapa#spRudhEthAM trEqdhA saqhasraqM ~Mvi tadai#rayEthAM || 
trINyAyU(gm)#Shiq tava# jAtavEdastiqsra AqjAnI#ruqShasa#stE agnE | 
tABi#rdEqvAnAqmavO# yakShi viqdvAnathA# - [  ]   45
